name: Fox Hunt
desc:
You appear to transform yourself into three separate foxes. You can't attack or cast spells in this form, but you can move each fox separately during your turn. Each fox shares your AC, and if a fox would take damage, it disappears.
At the start of your next turn, you choose one fox to reveal as yourself. If only one fox is left remaining, the spell ends immediately. If all remaining foxes take damage simultaneously, choose one fox to reveal as yourself.
empower: You transform into five foxes instead.
